entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:16 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
